mapper.sql: id, school_name, school_en_name, memo, score, school_code, class_id, type_id, nature_id, location_code, school_logo
mapper.select: select a.* from school_info a,school_info_link b where a.school_code = b.school_code and b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into school_info (id, school_name, school_en_name, memo, score, school_code, class_id, type_id, nature_id, location_code, school_logo) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{natureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update school_info
school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_en_name = #{schoolEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_code = #{schoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

location_code = #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_logo = #{schoolIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
